entities.name: ottery st catchpole
entities.description: The lane where Harry and his friends are walking towards the Burrow.

entities.name: burrow
entities.description: Harry's home, located in the countryside.

entities.name: daily prophet
entities.description: A wizarding newspaper that reports on current events and news.

entities.name: dark mark
entities.description: A symbol of the Dark Arts, used by Lord Voldemort to intimidate and terrorize others.

entities.name: quidditch world cup
entities.description: An international Quidditch tournament that has been disrupted by dark magic.

relationships.description: The lane where Harry and his friends are walking towards the Burrow, which is located in that area.
The Daily Prophet newspaper reports on the scenes of terror at the Quidditch World Cup, as seen in its headline and photograph.
The Dark Mark is associated with the disruption of the Quidditch World Cup, as seen in the newspaper headline and photograph.
